meta.tagline: Safe, automated, on-chain treasury management for Bitcoin Cash

content.headline: Treasury Management That Enforces Itself
content.subheadline: FlowGuard locks your BCH in covenant-controlled vaults with scheduled releases, multi-party approvals, and spending caps‚Äîall enforced on-chain. No custody handoff. No manual execution.

content.headline: Treasury Operations Fail When Execution Is Manual

problems.title: Spreadsheet Governance
problems.description: Payouts tracked in Google Sheets. Approvals happen in Telegram. No on-chain proof.

problems.title: Multisig Fatigue
problems.description: Signers burn out. Transactions pile up. Emergency payouts bypass process.

problems.title: Budget Drift
problems.description: Spending caps exist in docs, not code. Enforcement is social pressure.

content.headline: FlowGuard Vaults: Policy-Driven Treasury Execution
content.description: A vault is a covenant-controlled UTXO. Policies are encoded in the contract. Execution requires valid transactions that satisfy the rules‚Äîno backend can override them.

features.title: Recurring Unlock Schedules
features.description: Configure periodic releases (weekly, monthly, custom intervals). Deterministic cycle logic prevents releases beyond the configured schedule.

features.title: Multi-Signature Approval
features.description: Set M-of-N thresholds (2-of-3, 3-of-5, etc.). No single party can drain the vault. Different actions can require different thresholds.

features.title: Spending Guardrails
features.description: Caps per proposal, per period, per recipient. Allowlists and timelocks. All enforced by covenant logic.

features.title: Full Transparency
features.description: Every vault action is visible on-chain: creation, proposals, approvals, executions, cycle releases.

features.title: Non-Custodial Security
features.description: You control your keys. Funds locked in covenant-controlled UTXOs. No admin backdoors.

features.title: BCH Native
features.description: Built with CashScript on Bitcoin Cash. Uses covenant technology for efficient on-chain logic.

content.headline: CashTokens & DAO Governance
content.description: FlowGuard vaults can hold and control BCH, CashTokens Fungible Tokens (FT), and NFTs. This enables DAO governance tokens, token vesting schedules, and token-weighted proposal voting.

capabilities.title: Token Vesting
capabilities.description: Create vesting vaults that release governance tokens by schedule with cliffs and interval-linear vesting.

capabilities.title: Token-Weighted Voting
capabilities.description: Optional DAO mode where proposals require governance voting with weight derived from CashToken FT holdings.

capabilities.title: Multi-Asset Treasuries
capabilities.description: Single vault can manage BCH + multiple CashTokens FTs + NFTs with unified policy enforcement.

content.headline: Interval-Based Execution, Not Streaming
content.description: Bitcoin Cash uses a UTXO model. FlowGuard executes treasury actions in discrete, verifiable intervals. The protocol guarantees correctness‚Äîrules cannot be violated‚Äîand execution happens when an authorized party broadcasts the valid transaction.

content.headline: Spending Guardrails
content.description: Set policy rules that the covenant enforces at execution time.

guardrails.title: Caps Per Proposal
guardrails.description: Maximum amount for any single proposal

guardrails.title: Caps Per Recipient
guardrails.description: Limits on how much any address can receive

guardrails.title: Role-Based Approvals
guardrails.description: Different thresholds for different action types

guardrails.title: Emergency Pause
guardrails.description: Optional pause mechanism for critical situations
